title: Where are T2 runes
body:
Hi,
I'm trying to upgrade my runes. No matter how detailed I looked in the store. Mark of Ability Power is missing. Is it just me? Or a new update? What's happening?

replies.body:
Pretty sure a Mark of AP doesn't exist in Tier 2.

They removed all the lesser worth more complicated ones (Marks of AP aren't actually better then magic pen)

EDIT: Link is http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rune-combiner-t1/t2-runes
if the rune doesnt exist in Tier 1 or 2, thats Riot's way of saying its a dumb rune LOL
